item.title: Chapter 3: Snakemake for RNA-seq
item.description: Introduction Snakemake is a python-based pipeline software that can be used to automate the workflow of bioinformatics analysis. In this chapter, we will use snakemake to build a RNA-seq analysis pipeline. Installation Install Miniconda Download the Miniconda installer for Linux from here Run the installer Add the following line to your .bashrc file 1 export PATH="/home/username/miniconda3/bin:$PATH" Run the following command to update conda 1 conda update conda Install Snakemake 1 conda install -c bioconda -c conda-forge snakemake Pipeline Quality Control FastQC Input: Fastq files Output: FastQC report Command 1 fastqc -o {output} {input} 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 rule fastqc: input: "data/{sample}_1.
